summary: Completed comprehensive testing of jeans inventory management MVP. All core features working correctly after fixing frontend transaction bug.
passed_tests: Backend API connectivity and all endpoints (22/22 tests passed)
Homepage loads with proper white/blue theme and Google Sans font
Dashboard displays real-time stats (total stock, received today, shipped today, low stock)
Add new inventory item with SKU, size, color, quantity, supplier
Search inventory items by SKU, color, size, or supplier
Add new supplier with name, contact, address, payment terms, active status
Navigation between all pages (Homepage, Login, Dashboard, Suppliers)
